game.name: Hiyah Go!
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Hiyah GO! is a fast-paced monster battle royale where you cast spells with your voice. Summon creatures, shout your attacks, and fight to be the last summoner standing. Unlock new monster and player skins as you climb to the top!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Hiyah GO! is a fast-paced monster battle royale where you cast spells with your voice. Summon creatures, shout your attacks, and fight to be the last summoner standing. Unlock new monster and player skins as you climb to the top!
